meanings.definition: The practice of buying and selling stocks for profit.
meanings.sent1: Stockjobbing can be a risky way to make money in the stock market.
meanings.sent2: Many people engage in stockjobbing to try and increase their wealth.
meanings.sent3: The stockjobbing frenzy at the exchange was like a fast-paced game of chance.
meanings.sent4: Her approach to stockjobbing was like a skilled dance, carefully balancing risk and reward.
meanings.sent5: The allure of stockjobbing drew in both seasoned investors and newcomers alike.

meanings.definition: A person who engages in the buying and selling of stocks for profit.
meanings.sent1: As a stockjobbing expert, he knew all the ins and outs of the market.
meanings.sent2: The stockjobbing community was abuzz with news of the latest market trends.
meanings.sent3: The young stockjobbing prodigy quickly gained a reputation for his savvy investments.
meanings.sent4: She was known as the queen of stockjobbing, always one step ahead of the market.
meanings.sent5: In the world of stockjobbing, reputation and results were everything.
